title: Cyberpunk VII & VIII - Game Music Pack - Aggressive, Electronic, Midtempo Hybrid
description: Made exclusively for Action, Cyberpunk and Sci-Fi games, Cyberpunk is a game music pack that brings life to your games.
longDescription:
From censored rebels fighting for their nation to robots awakening with free thought, Cyberpunk VII and Cyberpunk VIII are game music packs crafted for the stories that captivate us. These packs are your sonic gateway to neon-lit streets and digital dystopias.

Listen to the Soundtrack Packs here:

  • Cyberpunk VII
  • Cyberpunk VIII

What’s Inside Each Pack:

  • 8 original high-quality music tracks
  • 8 original high-quality music loops
  • 16 total files

Tracklist:

Cyberpunk VII:

(00:00) 01 - Back 2 Back

(00:33) 02 - Delorean Time

(01:03) 03 - Penguin

(01:37) 04 - Not Forever

(02:07) 05 - Not Too Long

(02:35) 06 - Not Too Long (Alt Version)

(03:09) 07 - Long Story Short

(03:42) 08 - Wise Advice (Alt Version)

Cyberpunk VIII:

(00:00) 01 - Prodigy

(00:33) 02 - Against The Wall

(01:03) 03 - Against The Wall (Alt Version)

(01:37) 04 - Mechanic Glove

(02:07) 05 - Try Harder

(02:35) 06 - Revenge

(03:09) 07 - A Ride Is Not Hurtful

(03:42) 08 - Confusing Chick


(All file formats are in WAV, Stereo, 44.8kHz, 32bit)


With these game music/soundtrack packs, you also:

  • Sounds great in any device: All music themes and stingers are fully mixed and mastered for seamless playback on any device.
  • Avoid incongruent volumes: All themes and stingers are mastered for consistent volume throughout the soundtrack.
  • Repeat music seamlessly: All music themes are fully loop-able, allowing for uninterrupted gameplay.


About the Composer:

Lufus is a music producer and composer known for creating the Original Soundtracks for multi-million downloaded games, including:

  • Parchisi Star Online (50 Million Downloads)
  • Pixel Car Racer (10 Million Downloads)
  • Drift Clash (5 Million Downloads) and more


Support & Help:

If you need help downloading these soundtrack/music packs, feel free to reach out to iamlufus@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Designed for Cyberpunk Worlds: Immerse players in gritty, futuristic atmospheres with music tailored for Cyberpunk, Sci-Fi, and Action games.
  • Two Distinct Packs (VII & VIII): Offers a broader range of cyberpunk-themed music to suit different in-game scenarios and moods.
  • High-Quality Audio: WAV format delivers pristine sound quality for immersive gaming experiences.
  • Seamless Looping: All music tracks are fully loopable, allowing for continuous playback without any breaks.
  • Mastered for Consistency: Tracks are balanced for volume and audio quality, ensuring smooth transitions and a polished sound.

Number of Audio WAVs: 16 per pack (32 total)

Number of Audio Cues: 16 per pack (32 total)

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.8kHz / 32bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 31

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes (WAV files are platform-independent)

Documentation: While formal documentation is not specified, users can find tracklists and relevant information within this description.

Important/Additional Notes:

  • Music is provided as individual WAV files for flexible implementation in game engines.
  • Composer contact information (iamlufus@gmail.com) is provided for support.
